Name: amowner
Description: user ID of the owner (currently not used)

Name: amstrategies
Description: number of operator strategies for this access\n method

Name: amsupport
Description: number of support routines for this access\n method

Name: amorderstrategy
Description: zero if the index offers no sort order, otherwise the\n strategy number of the strategy operator that describes the sort order

Name: amindexnulls
Description: does AM support NULL index entries?
